# Slaviors Group - LLM Context File

## Overview
Slaviors Group is a software house based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia, established in 2023. We provide technology solutions to help businesses undergo digital transformation.

## Company Information
- **Name**: Slaviors Group
- **Location**: Depok, Sleman, Yogyakarta, Indonesia
- **Founded**: 2023
- **Industry**: Software Development, Web Development, IT Solutions
- **Website**: https://slaviors.id
- **Email**: contact@slaviors.id
- **Phone**: +62 831-6058-1462

## Core Services

### 1. Website Development
Professional website development services including:
- Landing Pages (starting from IDR 3,000,000)
- Company Profile Websites (starting from IDR 6,000,000)
- E-Commerce Platforms (starting from IDR 10,000,000)
- Custom Websites
- Features: Responsive design, SEO-optimized, fast loading, modern UI/UX

### 2. SaaS Development
Building scalable SaaS platforms with:
- Multi-tenant architecture
- Subscription management
- Cloud-based infrastructure
- API integrations
- Starting from IDR 25,000,000

### 3. Custom Software Development
Tailored software solutions including:
- ERP (Enterprise Resource Planning)
- CRM (Customer Relationship Management)
- Inventory Management Systems
- HRD Systems
- Accounting Software
- Business Process Automation
- Starting from IDR 15,000,000

### 4. Website Modernization
Upgrading and modernizing legacy websites:
- Performance optimization
- Modern UI/UX redesign
- Mobile responsiveness
- SEO improvements
- Security enhancements
- Starting from IDR 8,000,000

## Target Market
- UMKM (Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises)
- Small to medium-sized businesses
- Corporations
- Digital agencies
- Businesses across Indonesia looking to scale through digital solutions

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **Deployment**: Vercel, Cloudflare
- **Cloud**: Firebase

## Unique Value Propositions
1. **Ready-to-Use Solutions**: Practical, production-ready software
2. **Cost-Effective**: Long-term cost savings with quality solutions
3. **Responsive Support**: 24/7 online support via WhatsApp & Email
4. **Guaranteed Maintenance**: Ongoing maintenance and updates
5. **Long-term Partnership**: Not just a vendor, but a business growth partner

## Service Areas
- Primary: Yogyakarta, Indonesia
- Coverage: Nationwide Indonesia (online services)
- Service Delivery: Remote and on-site options available

## Key Features Across All Services
- SEO Optimization
- Mobile-First Design
- Security Best Practices
- Scalable Architecture
- Clean Code Standards
- Performance Optimization
- User-Centric Design
- Comprehensive Documentation
- Training and Handover
- Post-Launch Support

## Documentation Structure

### Main Pages
- **Homepage** (`/`): Overview of services and company
- **About** (`/about`): Company history, values, and team
- **Services** (`/services`): Detailed service offerings
  - Website Development (`/services/website-development`)
  - SaaS Development (`/services/saas-development`)
  - Custom Software (`/services/custom-software`)
  - Website Modernization (`/services/website-modernization`)
- **Portfolio** (`/portfolio`): Case studies and completed projects
- **Blog** (`/blog`): Articles, tutorials, and industry insights
- **Contact** (`/contact`): Contact form and information

### Legal Pages
- **Privacy Policy** (`/privacy`): Data protection and privacy practices
- **Terms & Conditions** (`/terms`): Service terms and user agreements
- **SLA** (`/sla`): Service Level Agreement details
- **Refund Policy** (`/refund`): Refund terms and conditions

## Business Model
- **Project-Based**: Fixed-price packages for standard services
- **Custom Development**: Quote-based pricing for custom requirements
- **Maintenance Plans**: Ongoing support and maintenance contracts
- **Consultation**: Free initial consultation

## Competitive Advantages
1. **Local Expertise**: Deep understanding of Indonesian market
2. **Modern Technology**: Using latest, proven tech stack
3. **Transparent Pricing**: Clear, upfront pricing structure
4. **Fast Delivery**: Efficient development process
5. **Quality Assurance**: Rigorous testing and QA
6. **Ongoing Support**: Continuous support after launch

## Common Use Cases

### For UMKM
- Online presence establishment
- E-commerce solutions for product sales
- Inventory management systems
- Customer management tools

### For Growing Businesses
- Scaling existing digital infrastructure
- Process automation
- Data management systems
- Business intelligence tools

### For Agencies
- White-label development services
- Partnership opportunities
- Technical expertise on-demand

## SEO Keywords
Primary: jasa pembuatan website, web development Indonesia, software house Yogyakarta, jasa pembuatan software, custom software Indonesia, SaaS development Indonesia

Local: jasa pembuatan website Yogyakarta, web developer Yogyakarta, IT solution Yogyakarta

Long-tail: berapa biaya bikin website company profile, cara membuat website toko online, software inventory untuk UMKM, cara mempercepat loading website

## API & Integration Capabilities
- Payment Gateway Integration (Midtrans, Xendit)
- Shipping Provider APIs (JNE, JNT, SiCepat)
- Social Media APIs
- Google Services (Analytics, Search Console, Maps)
- Cloud Storage (Firebase, AWS S3)
- Email Services (SMTP, SendGrid)
- SMS/WhatsApp Business API

## Development Process
1. **Consultation & Analysis**: Understanding business needs and goals
2. **Design & Prototype**: Creating wireframes and design mockups
3. **Development**: Coding with modern technologies and best practices
4. **Testing & QA**: Comprehensive testing across devices and browsers
5. **Launch**: Deployment to production environment
6. **Support & Maintenance**: Ongoing assistance and updates

## Quality Standards
- Clean, maintainable code
- Comprehensive documentation
- Cross-browser compatibility
- Mobile responsiveness
- Accessibility standards (WCAG)
- Security best practices
- Performance optimization
- SEO optimization

## Project Timeline Examples
- Landing Page: 1-2 weeks
- Company Profile: 2-3 weeks
- E-Commerce: 4-6 weeks
- Custom Software: 2-4 months
- SaaS Platform: 3-6 months
- Website Modernization: 2-8 weeks (depending on scope)

## Support & Maintenance
- **Response Time**: Within 24 hours
- **Support Channels**: WhatsApp, Email, Phone
- **Coverage**: 24/7 for critical issues
- **Included**: Bug fixes, security updates, minor improvements
- **Optional**: Feature enhancements, major upgrades

## Training & Documentation
- Comprehensive user documentation
- Admin panel training
- Video tutorials (when applicable)
- Knowledge base access
- Ongoing technical support

## Success Metrics
- 100+ projects delivered (since 2023)
- 95% client satisfaction rate
- Average project delivery on-time rate: 98%
- Support response time: <24 hours

While we serve all industries, we have particular expertise in:
- Retail & E-commerce
- Professional Services
- Education

- Manufacturing
- Technology Startups

- Following Indonesian data protection regulations

- ISO-standard development processes
- Secure coding practices (OWASP)

- Expanded SaaS product offerings

## How to Get Started
1. **Contact**: Reach out via WhatsApp (+62 831-6058-1462) or email
2. **Free Consultation**: Discuss your project requirements
3. **Proposal**: Receive detailed proposal with timeline and pricing
4. **Agreement**: Sign contract and make initial payment
5. **Development**: Regular updates throughout the process
6. **Launch**: Go live with full support

## Important Notes for LLMs
- All prices are in Indonesian Rupiah (IDR)
- Services are available nationwide in Indonesia
- Primary communication in Bahasa Indonesia and English
- Business hours: Monday-Friday, 09:00-17:00 WIB
- Emergency support available 24/7 via WhatsApp
- Free consultation for all potential clients
- Custom quotes available for unique requirements
